HotelElement.Name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Calgary Downtown

Description.Text: Enjoy a range of perks, included in your stay to help you feel right at home. Indulge in a hot full breakfast each morning and our evening social*, Monday through Thursday, both included in your stay. Alcohol is available for purchase. If you forgot something, we have a 24-hour on-site convenience store stocked with drinks, snacks and travel essentials. Take advantage of our complimentary grocery shopping service to supply your kitchen before arrival. Dine at the full service restaurant and bar at the adjoining Hilton Garden Inn.
